SEARCH

Class Terrain

java.lang.Object
Terrain
public class Terrain extends Object
Represents the game terrain. This class handles the different types of terrain that can exist in the game, which may affect the movement and abilities of the warriors.

    • isInMapBounds

      public boolean isInMapBounds(int x, int y)
      isInMapBounds Checks if the specified coordinates are within the map bounds.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate.
      y - The y-coordinate.
      Returns:
      True if the coordinates are within bounds, otherwise false.
